```{r merge-results, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
source("scripts/libraries.R")
state_list <- c("odisha")
state_summary_df <- data.frame()
for(i in 1:length(state_list)){
  state_summary_data <- readr::read_csv(glue("data/Results/{state_list[[i]]}.csv"))
  total_gps <- sum(state_summary_data$total_gps)
  total_gps_mapped <- sum(state_summary_data$total_gps_mapped)
  percent_gps_mapped <- round(total_gps_mapped/total_gps*100)
  state_summary_df <-
    bind_rows(
      state_summary_df,
      data.frame(
        'state_name' = state_list[[i]],
        'total_gps' = total_gps,
        'total_gps_mapped' = total_gps_mapped,
        'percent_gps_mapped' = percent_gps_mapped
      )
    )
}

knitr::kable(state_summary_df, format = 'pipe',caption = "Scheme GP - Constituency Mapping Summary")
```
